title: 10 Best Things The Water 7 Arc Added To One Piece's Story
author: CBR Editorial Team
description: An analysis of the Water 7 arc's best story elements, including Franky's character depth, his past with Iceberg, CP5's strategy of framing Tom, and Tom's philosophy about taking pride in his ships despite their use.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs

title: One Piece: Franky's Past, Explained
author: Rei Penber
description: A detailed explanation of Franky's backstory, covering how Tom convinced his persecutors to delay his sentencing to build the Puffing Tom, Franky and Iceburg's work on the Sea Train, and Spandam's use of Battle Frankies to frame Tom.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Franky's entire backstory through his joining the Straw Hats

title: One Piece: How the Water 7 Arc Sets Up the Perfect Payoff
author: Suzail Ahmad
description: An analysis of how the Water 7 arc's pacing works despite its length, with particular focus on how Franky's backstory gives weight to his motivations and explores Water 7's history and the Puffing Tom's creation.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for Water 7 and Enies Lobby arcs

title: One Piece: How Franky Changed From Villain to Nakama
author: Rei Penber
description: An article explaining Franky's journey from antagonist to Straw Hat crew member, detailing how he was abandoned by pirate parents and taken in by Tom, helping to build the Sea Train meant to save Water 7.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through Franky joining the Straw Hat crew

title: One Piece Diaries #31 â€“ Water 7 Arc #3
author: S.L. Gallant
description: A first-time watcher's diary-style recap and reaction to the Water 7 arc, providing a fresh perspective on the Tom's Workers storyline and Franky's backstory.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers episodes up to 250, spoiler-free beyond that point

title: One Piece: Water 7 Arc | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: A comprehensive summary, recap, and review of the Water 7 arc, praising the masterful blend of thrilling action, poignant drama, and rich atmosphere, with detailed coverage of Franky and Tom's relationship.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Water 7 arc
